palabras.definicion: A group of people in a society who share particular qualities or ways of behaving which that society associates with being male, female, or another identity
The money that a person or company has
An accepted standard or a way of behaving or doing things that most people agree with
A person who you work with
The right of different groups of people to have a similar social position and receive the same treatment
Someone with a very great ability that usually shows itself when that person is a young child
The condition or right of being able or allowed to do, say, think, etc. whatever you want to, without being controlled or limited
A person who is staying with you, or a person you have invited to a social occasion
The characteristic of often changing and being different
An alcoholic drink that is usually made from grapes
